main event: A ground-radar operator detected a single unidentified target with unusual characteristics near Nantucket Island, Massachusetts on December 13, 1960.
interesting points: The detected target was larger than a typical aircraft, It traveled at approximately 3000 mph and made abrupt right-angle turns, Several radar blips were detected during the observation, The sighting lasted about 3 minutes, No photographs or physical evidence were associated with the sighting.
sighted object: a single unidentified target detected on radar
